entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is being pulled away by Mr. Weasley. ("He seized Tonks’s wrist and pulled her away")

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who appears out of thin air at the gate, accompanied by Rufus Scrimgeour. ("a second later, Mr. Weasley had appeared out of thin air at the gate")

entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: Rufus Scrimgeour is a person who appears with Mr. Weasley, instantly recognizable by his mane of grizzled hair. ("Rufus Scrimgeour, instantly recognizable by his mane of grizzled hair")

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a person who looks bewildered at the sudden appearance of Mr. Weasley and Rufus Scrimgeour. ("Mrs. Weasley looked bewildered")

entities.name: the minister
entities.description: The Minister is a person who is being referred to by Mrs. Weasley, but her identity is not specified. ("The Minister — but why — ?")

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley pulled Tonks away from the fence. ("He seized Tonks’s wrist and pulled her away")
Mr. Weasley appeared with Rufus Scrimgeour at the gate. ("a second later, Mr. Weasley had appeared out of thin air at the gate")
Rufus Scrimgeour appeared with Mr. Weasley, instantly recognizable by his mane of grizzled hair. ("Rufus Scrimgeour, instantly recognizable by his mane of grizzled hair")
Mrs. Weasley looked bewildered at the sudden appearance of Mr. Weasley and Rufus Scrimgeour. ("Mrs. Weasley looked bewildered")
